first_para: Eleanor Fulton Laing, née Pritchard, (born 1 February 1958) is a British politician. Laing is the Conservative Member of Parliament for Epping Forest, a constituency she has represented since 1997. In October 2013 fellow MPs elected her as a Deputy Speaker of the House of Commons, replacing Nigel Evans.

full.extract: Eleanor Fulton Laing, née Pritchard, (born 1 February 1958) is a British politician. Laing is the Conservative Member of Parliament for Epping Forest, a constituency she has represented since 1997. In October 2013 fellow MPs elected her as a Deputy Speaker of the House of Commons, replacing Nigel Evans.
full.title: Eleanor Laing
